name: Glimpse of Fear
description:
An experience to let you discover what is eye tracking in game

Coupled with tobii eyeX you can unlock unique features:
• Game Camera controll by your gaze
• Throw objects where your are looking at
• Picked objects and interact with your environment
• Eye contact and bad or positive behaviours with non player character

Want to discover new gaming experience ?

Discover what is the eye tracker at Tobii gaming product
